wikipedia_page.main:
Margot Perryman (born 1938) is a British artist.
Margot Perryman was born in 1938 in Plymouth, and studied at the Harrow School of Art, which is now part of the University of Westminster, and then specialised in painting at the Slade School of Art.Perryman's 1969 painting Arcade is in the permanent collection of the Tate Gallery.
